name: bonusprojectstudentdetails
description: Technology: Use any. Database: MYSQL / MongoDB / (Use any) Below are the task requirements. Task The task is very simple. You just need to think twice and follow the below instruction 1. Create a login screen. 2. After logging in the student list will appear with filters(name, subject) and add/edit/view/delete. 3. While adding a student with the student and subject combination that already exists in the database then include the marks in existing marks. otherwise, it will create a new student record.
